item.title: 汇丰将在美国招聘近 50 名银行家为初创企业和风险企业提供贷款服务
item.description: 据一位高级管理人员透露，汇丰银行正计划在其美国商业银行增聘约 50 名银行家，为初创公司提供贷款，这些公司主要集中在科技和医疗保健领域。【原文：HSBC is planning to recruit about 50 more bankers in its U.S. commercial bank to lend to startup companies, mainly in the technology and healthcare sectors, according to a senior executive.】

item.title: 巴西 2 月月度通胀率预测为一年来最高 路透社调查
item.description: 路透社的一项民意调查显示，巴西的月通胀率在 2 月份可能加速上升至一年来的最高点，由于农产品供应充足和经济形势疲软，未来几个月的通胀率应该会从这一水平开始回落。【原文：Brazil's monthly inflation rate likely accelerated to a one-year high in February, a Reuters poll found, from where it should begin to fall back again in coming months due to abundant supplies of farm products and softer economic conditions.】

item.title: 特朗普称减税等措施可抵消关税影响
item.description: 美国共和党总统候选人唐纳德-特朗普周一在接受 CNBC 采访时为他提出的征收 10%关税的提议进行了辩护，他表示，价格上涨等对家庭造成的任何影响都可以通过减税和其他行动来抵消。【原文：Republican U.S. presidential candidate President Donald Trump on Monday defended his proposed 10% tariff, telling CNBC in an interview that any impact on families such as higher prices could be offset by tax cuts and other actions.】

item.title: 西班牙高等法院维持对 Worldcoin 虹膜扫描企业的临时禁令
item.description: 西班牙高等法院周一维持了对 Worldcoin 虹膜扫描项目的临时禁令，这是对这个在多个国家引发隐私问题的项目的最新打击。【原文：Spain's High Court on Monday upheld a temporary ban on Worldcoin's iris-scanning venture, in the latest blow to a project that has sparked privacy concerns in several countries.】

item.title: 霍尼韦尔将就庞巴迪发动机定价案向加拿大最高法院寻求 "救济
item.description: 霍尼韦尔（Honeywell）表示，将请求加拿大最高法院审理涉及公务机制造商庞巴迪（Bombardier）的发动机定价案，这一争端引起了竞争对手飞机制造商对泄露商业谈判机密条款的担忧。【原文：Honeywell said it will ask Canada's top court to hear an engine pricing case involving business jet maker Bombardier , in a dispute that has raised concerns among rival planemakers about revealing confidential terms of business negotiations.】

item.title: Choice 结束竞购温德姆酒店，提高回购力度
item.description: Choice Hotels International 周一表示，由于未能获得目标公司股东的足够支持，该公司已经终止了对竞争对手温德姆酒店及度假村（Wyndham Hotels & Resorts）长达数月的收购要约。【原文：Choice Hotels International has terminated its months-long takeover bid for rival Wyndham Hotels & Resorts after failing to gather enough support from the target's shareholders, the company said on Monday.】

item.title: 芒果美国扩张助力 2023 年销售额突破 34 亿美元
item.description: 时装零售商 Mango 周一表示，2023 年其销售额将增长 19%，达到创纪录的 31 亿欧元（33.9 亿美元），与西班牙竞争对手 Zara 在美国的强劲扩张不相上下。【原文：Fashion retailer Mango said on Monday its sales rose 19% to a record 3.1 billion euros ($3.39 billion) in 2023, after matching Spanish rival Zara's strong expansion in the United States.】

item.title: Reddit 在期待已久的美国 IPO 中目标估值高达 64 亿美元
item.description: 社交媒体平台 Reddit 周一表示，其美国首次公开募股（IPO）的目标估值将高达 64 亿美元，因为它即将成为过去几年中最受瞩目的股市首次公开募股之一。【原文：Reddit is aiming for a valuation of up to $6.4 billion in its U.S. initial public offering (IPO), the social media platform said on Monday, as it nears one of the most-anticipated stock market debuts of the last few years.】

item.title: 美联储银行紧急行动结束贷款，目光转向贴现窗口
item.description: 在硅谷银行倒闭引发的沉重压力下，美联储于一年前匆忙启动的一项机制于周一关闭，因为有证据表明，该机制帮助扭转了有可能使经济脱轨并破坏央行降低通胀努力的困境。【原文：A Federal Reserve facility launched in haste a year ago amid the heavy stress triggered by Silicon Valley Bank's collapse closes for new business on Monday, amid evidence it helped turn the tide of trouble that risked derailing the economy and upending the central bank’s efforts to lower inflation.】

item.title: 早间交易英伟达、日经指数下跌 - 中国躲过通货紧缩
item.description: Mike Dolan 展望美国和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan】

item.title: 聚焦：美国碳管道公司承诺不采油，但巴肯钻井商却希望采油
item.description: Summit Carbon Solutions 公司正试图建造美国最大的二氧化碳捕集管道，用于运输和掩埋温室气体，该公司一再保证，其项目不会被钻井商用于提高油田产量。【原文：Summit Carbon Solutions, which is trying to build the biggest carbon dioxide capture pipeline in the United States to transport and bury greenhouse gases, has repeatedly pledged its project will not be used by drillers to boost output from oil fields.】

item.title: GoldenTree 首支私人信贷基金融资 13.5 亿美元
item.description: 金树资产管理公司（GoldenTree Asset Management）周一发表声明称，该公司为其首支纯私人信贷基金募集了超过 13.5 亿美元的资金，在蓬勃发展的市场上站稳了脚跟。【原文：GoldenTree Asset Management raised over $1.35 billion for its first pure private credit fund, the firm said in a statement on Monday, getting a strong foothold in a booming market.】

item.title: 美国参议员寻求重新分配政府频谱以促进 5G 网络发展
item.description: 两位共和党高级参议员将于周一提出立法，要求拍卖部分美国政府拥有的频谱，以促进商用无线 5G 网络的发展。【原文：Two top Republican senators are introducing legislation on Monday that would require some U.S. government-owned spectrum be auctioned off to boost commercial wireless 5G networks.】

item.title: 洞察力：下一次自动驾驶审判将检验特斯拉的 "驾驶者责任 "辩护
item.description: "汽车制造商总裁乔恩-麦克尼尔（Jon McNeill）在一封电子邮件中说："我在自动驾驶功能下感到非常舒适，以至于最后因为沉浸在电子邮件或电话中而错过了出口（我知道，我知道，不建议使用）。【原文："I got so comfortable under Autopilot, that I ended up blowing by exits because I was immersed in emails or calls (I know, I know, not a recommended use)," said the automaker's president Jon McNeill in an email after he tried out the feature in a Model X. Now the email is being used in a lawsuit against Tesla.】

item.title: 美联储预测将显示降息前景是否通过强劲数据保持不变
item.description: 没有人预计美联储会在下周的政策会议上改变利率，但由于经济表现持续好于预期，官员们是否会坚持之前的降息前景是一个更加悬而未决的问题。【原文：No one expects the Federal Reserve to change interest rates at next week's policy meeting, but whether officials hold to their previous rate-cutting outlook is a more open question as the economy keeps outperforming expectations.】

item.title: 美国对250,712辆本田汽车制动问题展开调查
item.description: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局（NHTSA）周一开始对约250,712辆本田Insight和本田Passport汽车因不慎启动自动紧急制动系统进行初步评估。【原文：The U.S. National Highway Traffic Safety Administration (NHTSA) on Monday opened a preliminary evaluation into about 250,712 Honda Insight and Honda Passport vehicles over inadvertent activation of automatic emergency braking.】

item.title: 欧洲央行理事会卡齐米尔表示，欧洲央行即将降息，但还不是时候
item.description: 斯洛伐克管理委员会成员彼得-卡齐米尔（Peter Kazimir）周一表示，欧洲中央银行对通胀回落越来越有信心，但仍应在6月之前暂缓降息。【原文：The European Central Bank is increasingly confident that inflation is coming down, but should still hold off on an interest rate cut until June, Slovak Governing Council member Peter Kazimir said on Monday.】

item.title: 通胀数据公布前期货下跌
item.description: 在喜忧参半的就业数据强化了美联储将在年中开始宽松政策的预期之后，投资者在等待本周可能为美联储货币政策路径提供线索的关键通胀数据，美国股指期货周一下滑。【原文：U.S. stock index futures slipped on Monday, as investors awaited key inflation figures this week that could provide cues on the Federal Reserve's monetary policy path, after a mixed jobs data reinforced expectations that it will begin easing by mid-year.】

item.title: 埃隆-马斯克再次向 OpenAI 发起挑战，将 xAI 的 Grok 聊天机器人开源
item.description: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）周一表示，他的人工智能初创公司 xAI 将于本周开源其 ChatGPT 挑战者 "Grok"，几天前他曾起诉 OpenAI 放弃初衷，转而采用营利模式。【原文：Elon Musk said on Monday his artificial intelligence startup xAI would open-source its ChatGPT challenger "Grok" this week, days after he sued OpenAI for abandoning its original mission in favor of a for-profit model.】

item.title: 电力公司表示，特斯拉德国千兆工厂可从下周一起重新供电
item.description: 特斯拉位于柏林附近的德国千兆工厂自 3 月 5 日以来一直处于停电状态，负责解决停电问题的电力公司表示，从周一开始，该工厂可以重新获得电力供应。【原文：Tesla's German gigafactory near Berlin could be supplied with electricity again from Monday, the power firm in charge of fixing the ongoing power outage, which has downed the plant since March 5, said.】

item.title: 美国公司宣布在菲律宾投资超过 10 亿美元
item.description: 美国商务部长吉娜-雷蒙多（Gina Raimondo）周一对马尼拉进行正式访问时表示，美国公司将宣布在菲律宾投资超过10亿美元。【原文：U.S. companies are set to announce investments amounting to more than $1 billion dollars in the Philippines, United States Commerce Secretary Gina Raimondo said during an official visit to Manila on Monday.】

item.title: 比特币再创新高，突破 70,400 美元
item.description: 比特币周一创下了 70,400 美元以上的历史新高，最大加密货币的飙升势头丝毫没有放缓的迹象。【原文：Bitcoin hit a new record high on Monday above $70,400, as the surge in the biggest cryptocurrency showed no signs of slowing down.】

item.title: 美国投资者 Elliott 表示不会对英国 Currys 提出收购要约
item.description: 美国投资者埃利奥特顾问公司（Elliott Advisors）周一表示，不打算对英国电器零售商 Currys .【原文：U.S. investor Elliott Advisors said on Monday it does not intend to make an offer for British electricals retailer Currys .】

item.title: 独家：投资者敦促 Zara 所有者 Inditex 公布完整供应链
item.description: 投资者希望 Zara 的所有者 Inditex 效仿竞争对手 H&M 和 Primark，公布其全部供应商名单，以便更好地评估供应链风险。【原文：Investors want Zara owner Inditex to follow rivals H&M and Primark in making its full list of suppliers public so they can better assess any supply chain risks.】

item.title: 欧洲人工智能人才争夺战白热化
item.description: 大量人工智能（AI）初创企业的涌入使欧洲的技术人才争夺战日趋白热化，谷歌 DeepMind 等公司不得不在支付高额费用或失去该地区最优秀人才之间做出选择。【原文：An influx of artificial intelligence (AI) startups is heating up the battle for technical talent in Europe, leaving companies like Google DeepMind to choose between paying big or losing out on the region's best minds.】

item.title: 乐购和塞恩斯伯里抓住时机，英国杂货业落后者面临艰巨任务
item.description: 随着英国购物者每周都试图进一步压缩开支，超市龙头企业乐购（Tesco）和塞恩斯伯里（Sainsbury's）正利用其强大的财力，从负债累累、难以与之抗衡的竞争对手那里赢得顾客。【原文：As British shoppers try to stretch their spending further each week, supermarket leaders Tesco and Sainsbury's are using their superior financial firepower to win over customers from debt-laden rivals struggling to compete.】

item.title: 早间竞价强调日本央行的积极因素
item.description: 韦恩-科尔对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望。【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Wayne Cole.】

item.title: 大众退出澳大利亚汽车游说委员会，绿色燃料标准之争愈演愈烈
item.description: 澳大利亚大众汽车公司周一表示，它已退出该国汽车游说团的决策委员会，几天前特斯拉也切断了与该组织的联系，因为这家德国汽车制造商正在远离一场反对新燃料标准的运动。【原文：Volkswagen Australia said on Monday it had quit the policymaking committee at the country's auto lobby, days after Tesla cut ties with the group, as the German carmaker distances itself from a campaign against new fuel standards.】

item.title: 美国的目标是成为印度洋-太平洋地区的 "首选经济伙伴"--雷蒙多
item.description: 美国商务部长吉娜-雷蒙多（Gina Raimondo）将率领一个总统贸易和投资代表团从周一开始访问菲律宾，因为美国希望加强整个地区的经济联系。【原文：U.S. Commerce Secretary Gina Raimondo is leading a presidential trade and investment mission to the Philippines starting Monday as the United States looks to fortify economic ties across the region.】

item.title: 麦格理首席执行官：澳大利亚经济正走向 "软着陆
item.description: 麦格理集团（Macquarie Group）首席执行官谢马拉-维克拉马纳亚克（Shemara Wikramanayake）周一表示，澳大利亚经济已为 2024 年降息和长期通胀后的 "软着陆 "做好准备。【原文：Australia's economy is set up for interest rate cuts in 2024 and a "soft landing" after a lengthy period of inflation, Macquarie Group CEO Shemara Wikramanayake said on Monday.】
